articles.title: About Angela
articles.contents: Angela is the Assessment & Data Visualization Analyst in the Assessment & User Experience Department in the Duke University Libraries. She has many years of experience in teaching and training, predominantly focusing on teaching data visualization to university students, faculty, and staff. She is also active in several open source development projects, including FOLIO and Wax.

articles.title: Angela Zoss
articles.contents:
Select Projects
Visualization for Data Science in R
A two-day course on Visualization for Data Science in R, offered during Data Matters 2019.
Teach Viz By Example
A space for the data visualization teaching community to find, share, and contribute exemplary data visualizations + visualization-ready datasets.
FOLIO analytics
A repository of reports and other analytics developed for FOLIO and designed to run on the Library Data Platform.
Duke Libraries Journal Usage Dashboard
R scripts to prepare journal usage data and generate a dashboard.
